sentences.en: a few pieces of leftover carpet
But Aaron was too busy stuffing his pockets with leftover food.
sentences.cn: 而亚伦正忙着把剩下的食物装进兜里呢.

sentences.en: Give the leftovers to the dog.
He dragged a foot when he walked, a leftover from polio.
sentences.cn: 他走路时一瘸一拐的，那是小儿麻痹的后遗症。

sentences.en: He hashed the leftover pot roast.
sentences.cn: 他把剩余的炖牛肉切碎了.

sentences.en: He's a leftover from the hippies in the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 他是20世纪60年代嬉皮士的残余分子。

sentences.en: If I have any leftover coins , can I get cash back?
sentences.cn: 代币用不完可以换回现金 吗 ?

sentences.en: Leftover chicken makes a wonderful salad.
sentences.cn: 剩下的鸡肉可做成一盘美味色拉。

sentences.en: Leftover food and unwashed dishes cover the dirty counters.
sentences.cn: 台面上又脏又乱，尽是残羹剩菜和未洗的盘子。

sentences.en: Newborn stars, for instance, are surrounded by disks of leftover material.
sentences.cn: 举例来说, 新生的恒星四周会环绕著剩馀物质所构成的气盘.

sentences.en: Oh , yeah. Is this a cold - pizza talk or a leftover - meat loaf talk?
sentences.cn: 对, 这是冷披萨谈话还是烤肉剩菜谈话?

sentences.en: Ravel a bit of the leftover cloth to mend the tear in your dress.
sentences.cn: 拆开一点剩布的线,缝补你的衣服上的撕裂处.

sentences.en: The cook will utilise the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentences.cn: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤.

sentences.en: The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentences.cn: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤。

sentences.en: The headmaster was a leftover from the Victorian era.
sentences.cn: 校长是维多利亚时代的遗老

sentences.en: These narrow roads are a leftover from the days of horse - drawn carriages.
sentences.cn: 这些小道是从马车时代沿用下来的.

sentences.en: What do we do with this leftover chao mian?
Wonder if that bakery lets us take leftover home.
sentences.cn: 不知道那家糕饼店会不会让我们把卖剩的带回家.

words.tran_cn: 残留物；吃剩的饭菜；剩余物

trans.tran_en: remaining after all the rest has been used, taken, or eaten
food that has not been eaten at the end of a meal
